descriptions.on_model: Authentic wear. Vivid shots that capture the look, attitude and essence of your collections.
descriptions.access: A focus on accessories, captured with a precision that reveals every detail and highlights the workmanship and beauty of the product.
descriptions.ghost: A more modern vision of the clothing packshot, with no mannequin and a focus on cut and finish.
descriptions.pique: The timeless elegance of sharpness, precise, pretty, effective.
descriptions.flat: Le packshot à plat, une mise en scène simple et claire, pour révéler texture, matières et finitions.
descriptions.360: With our 360° packshots, view your products from every angle. A more immersive and complete experience to reveal maximum detail to your customers.
descriptions.cyclorama: Our cyclorama, your playground: a limitless space to bring all your ideas to life, from the simplest to the most ambitious.
